Generate strong and secure passwords effortlessly with the Random Password Generator Chrome extension. Safeguard your online accounts by creating unique and complex passwords tailored to your preferences.

Key Features:

Customize password length according to your security requirements.
User-friendly interface with a slider for easy length adjustment.
Material Design-inspired UI for a sleek and modern look.
Quick one-click password generation and copy functionality.
Enhance your online security with passwords that are hard to guess.

How to Use:

Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Click on the extension icon to open the user-friendly interface.
Use the slider to set your desired password length.
Click "Generate Password" to create a unique and secure password.
Click "Copy" to instantly copy the generated password to your clipboard.

Why Use Random Password Generator:

Avoid using easily guessable passwords.
Enhance security for your online accounts.
Generate complex passwords with just a click.
Material Design-inspired UI for a modern and intuitive experience.
